casebody.data:
Foster et al., Appellees, v. Cleveland Heights/University Heights Board of Education et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Foster v. Cleveland HtsJUniv. Hts. Bd. of Edn. (1995), 73 Ohio St.3d 714.]

(No. 94-2515 Submitted September 13, 1995 Decided October 4, 1995.) Comrich, Katz & Comrich Co., L.P.A., and Janet McCamley, for appellees. Thomas J. Downs, for appellants.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Adamsky v. Buckeye Local School Dist. (1995), 73 Ohio St.3d 360, 653 N.E.2d 212.

*715Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
